channel.title: I need help making 3 starter kits
channel.description:
How do I make a starter kit that you can only spawn once?
I want to make starter kits on my server. One for range, melee and magic. I dont want people spawning items over and over so they can get discontinued items with ease.
Someone help me on this please? :confused:

item.title: I need help making 3 starter kits
item.dc:creator: @Sick_of_Air Sick of Air
item.description:
@Sick_of_Air wrote:

Ok, I’m going to take a wild shot at this…

else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("COMMAND")) { if (hasegg == 0) { hasegg = 1; addItem(ITEM ID, AMMOUNT); addItem(ITEM ID, AMMOUNT); addItem(ITEM ID, AMMOUNT); }
Replace COMMAND with what you want the command to be.
Replace ITEM ID with the item id that you want to be spawned.
Replace AMMOUNT with the number of items you want spawned.
Do this for each of the commands you want. If you want more items spawned, just keep adding

	addItem(ITEM ID, AMMOUNT);

Hope this helps

Read full topic
item.source: I need help making 3 starter kits
